name: OpenClaw
description: OpenClaw is an open-source AI coding and automation assistant that runs as a local gateway with optional dashboard access. It lets you connect model providers and run structured agent workflows from a CLI and web interface.

notes.text: A gateway token is generated in `/opt/openclaw.env` (`OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TOKEN`) for LAN access on port `18789`.
Run `openclaw onboard` in the container shell to complete provider onboarding after deployment.
